hero.title: 5-Level Structured Referral Model
hero.subtitle: Integrated with the CEO Portal Dashboard
hero.tagline: Encourage structured partner expansion funded by a capped 3% pool without impacting core earnings.

objective.title: Objective
items: Encourage structured partner expansion up to 5 levels.
Funded by up to 3% deduction from BnC Global Platform Fee (10-25%).
No impact on Service / Technical / Strategic / International core earnings.
Paid only on realised client milestone revenue.

howItWorks.title: How It Works (Simple Example)
howItWorks.payout: When E generates revenue, all uplines (A-D) receive a structured override from the 3% pool.

distribution.title: 5-Level Distribution Model (From Max 3%)
distribution.note: If fewer levels exist, unused % remains with the platform.

governance.title: Governance Rules
items: Valid only for new partner onboarding
Platform reserves right to cap at 3%

dashboard.title: Referral Dashboard (Recommended)
dashboard.subtitle: Since your model is powered by the CEO Portal, transparency is critical.
dashboard.note: Values update after client milestones are realised.

tables.note: Sample view - data populates from realised milestones.

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: Fixed Asset Physical Verification
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Comprehensive, line-by-line on-site verification of fixed assets across locations to validate existence, location, and operational condition.
steps: Plan verification scope and asset universe
valueToConsultant: Expand into audit-support and compliance assignments

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: Asset Tagging & Identification
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Structured tagging solutions using barcodes, QR codes, RFID, metal, polyester, or vinyl tags to enable traceability and future audit efficiency.
valueToConsultant: Improve future audit efficiency for clients
Position yourself as a technology-driven advisor

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: FAR (Fixed Asset Register) Updation & Reconciliation
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Complete review, correction, and restructuring of the Fixed Asset Register to ensure accuracy and regulatory compliance.

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: Componentization (IFRS / Ind AS / IAS 16 Compliance)
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Identification and segregation of significant asset components for separate depreciation and regulatory compliance.
steps: Segregate components with varying useful lives

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: Stock & Inventory Verification
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Structured physical verification and reconciliation of stock to ensure accuracy and prevent shrinkage or misstatement.

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: Condition Assessment & Asset Health Review
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Evaluation of asset condition, operational efficiency, and impairment indicators to support financial and strategic decisions.
steps: Advise on maintenance or replacement strategy

physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.title: Regulatory & Compliance Review
physical-verification-stock-fixed-asset.coreOfferingIntro: Comprehensive review to ensure asset-related compliance with Companies Act, CARO, IFRS/Ind AS, and internal control frameworks.
steps: Prepare for audit and statutory review
valueToConsultant: Position yourself as a risk and compliance partner

steps: Identify AI usage across business functions
Evaluate algorithmic risks and compliance gaps

Consent and data processing framework design

Focus on sustainable compliance, not just documentation

termsAgreement.title: Terms & Conditions Agreement
termsAgreement.subtitle: Please review and sign to complete your partner agreement.
summaryItems: Partner commits to accurate, timely service delivery and ethical business practices.
Confidential information must be protected and used solely for collaboration purposes.
All engagements are subject to BnC Global quality standards and compliance policies.
Any disputes will be handled in good faith and resolved per applicable laws.
Agreement remains valid until terminated by either party with written notice.

sections.title: 1. Parties and Purpose
paragraphs: This Partner Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into between BnC Global Pvt. Ltd. ("BnC Global") and the undersigned partner ("Partner"). The purpose of this Agreement is to define the terms under which the Partner may collaborate with BnC Global to deliver services, generate qualified enquiries, and participate in joint opportunities.
By signing, the Partner confirms authority to enter this Agreement on behalf of its organization and agrees to operate in alignment with BnC Global standards and brand values.

sections.title: 2. Scope of Collaboration
paragraphs: BnC Global may refer opportunities, share leads, or invite the Partner to deliver defined services. The Partner may also introduce client requirements or opportunities to BnC Global for joint delivery.
Specific project scope, pricing, and timelines will be documented separately for each engagement and will form part of this Agreement once accepted by both parties.
bullets: Service delivery is subject to country, sector, and regulatory requirements.
All work must be performed by qualified professionals or approved subcontractors.
Any deviation from agreed scope requires written approval.

sections.title: 3. Term and Onboarding
paragraphs: This Agreement becomes effective on the signature date and remains active unless terminated in accordance with Section 12.
The Partner agrees to complete onboarding steps, including profile completion, compliance declarations, and any required documentation before commencing delivery.

sections.title: 4. Roles and Responsibilities
paragraphs: The Partner is responsible for timely delivery, professional conduct, and maintaining accurate records related to work performed.
BnC Global will provide engagement details, agreed commercial terms, and collaboration support as required.
bullets: Maintain confidentiality of all client and platform information.
Provide status updates, reports, and documentation on request.
Comply with applicable laws, including data protection obligations.

sections.title: 5. Quality Standards
paragraphs: All deliverables must meet BnC Global quality benchmarks. Where required, BnC Global may conduct quality reviews, audits, or request corrective actions.
Repeated quality issues or material non-compliance may lead to suspension or termination.

sections.title: 6. Commercial Terms
paragraphs: Commercial terms, including pricing, revenue share, or referral fees, will be specified per engagement. Payments are subject to successful delivery and acceptance of work.
The Partner is responsible for taxes, statutory obligations, and invoices in accordance with local law.

sections.title: 7. Confidentiality and Data Protection
paragraphs: Both parties agree to keep confidential all non-public information, including client data, pricing, processes, and technical documentation.
Data must be handled securely and only for the purposes of fulfilling the engagement.
bullets: No disclosure to third parties without written consent.
Maintain reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards.
Promptly notify BnC Global of any suspected breach.

sections.title: 8. Intellectual Property
paragraphs: Pre-existing intellectual property remains with the originating party. Work products created specifically for an engagement will be owned as agreed in the project scope.
The Partner may not use BnC Global trademarks or brand assets without prior written approval.

sections.title: 9. Non-Solicitation
paragraphs: During the term of this Agreement and for twelve (12) months thereafter, the Partner shall not directly solicit BnC Global clients, prospects, or employees for competing services without written consent.

sections.title: 10. Liability and Indemnity
paragraphs: Each party is responsible for its own acts and omissions. The Partner agrees to indemnify BnC Global against claims arising from Partner negligence, misconduct, or breach of this Agreement.
Neither party shall be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, except where prohibited by law.

sections.title: 11. Termination
paragraphs: Either party may terminate this Agreement with written notice. BnC Global may terminate immediately in the event of material breach, fraud, or compliance violations.
Upon termination, the Partner must return or securely destroy confidential materials and cease use of BnC Global brand assets.

sections.title: 12. Dispute Resolution and Governing Law
paragraphs: The parties will attempt to resolve disputes in good faith through senior management discussions. If unresolved, disputes will be subject to applicable laws and competent jurisdiction as defined in engagement documentation.

hero.subtitle: Refer partners, build a 5-level network, and earn structured commissions on every project milestone they close - up to
hero.subtitleTail: from the BNC Global Platform Fee.

descriptions.chain: A structured 5-level cascade - when someone at the end closes a project, every upline partner earns automatically.
descriptions.distribution: Each level receives a fixed share of the 3% pool. Unused levels remain with the platform.
descriptions.calculator: Enter a project revenue amount and instantly see how commissions distribute across all 5 levels.
descriptions.governance: Built for fairness, transparency, and long-term partner trust.

note.label: Important:
note.text: If fewer than 5 levels exist in your chain, unused percentage stays with the BNC Platform. The total commission pool is strictly capped at 3%, deducted only from the BNC Global Platform Fee (10-25%). Your Service, Technical, Strategic, and International earnings are completely untouched.

l1.label: Direct Referrer
l1.intent: Strongest reward for direct partner onboarding

chain.resultTitle: When E's Client Pays -> Everyone Earns
chain.resultDesc: The moment a project milestone is realised, commissions flow automatically up the chain - from Level 5 all the way to Level 1. Funded entirely from the BNC Platform Fee pool.
chain.resultStrong: Zero impact on your Service, Technical, Strategic, or International earnings.

r1.title: New Partners Only
r1.desc: Referral commissions apply exclusively to new partner onboarding. Existing partners cannot be re-referred.

r2.title: Realised Revenue Only
r2.desc: Commissions are paid only after project milestone revenue is confirmed and received by BNC Global.

r3.title: No Self-Referrals
r3.desc: You cannot refer yourself or create circular chains. All referrals must be genuine new connections.

r4.title: Active Partner Required
r4.desc: The referred partner must remain active on the platform for commissions to continue flowing upward.

r5.title: 3% Hard Cap
r5.desc: Total referral pool is strictly capped at 3%, deducted only from the BNC Platform Fee.

r6.title: Core Earnings Protected
r6.desc: Service, Technical, Strategic & International earnings are 100% unaffected by the referral deduction.

cta.subtitle: Join BNC Global's Referral Program today. Refer a partner, grow your chain, and watch commissions flow automatically with every closed project.

hero.subtitle: When one partner introduces another, and a client deal is closed, the benefit flows upward — rewarding everyone who helped build the network, funded entirely by BNC Global.

chain.label: The Referral Chain in Action
chain.heading: A Simple Structure, Powerful Results
chain.description: Partner A introduces B. Partner B introduces C. When C closes a client engagement with BNC Global — benefits flow upward through the entire chain.
chain.inShortText: When revenue is generated, the benefit flows upward through the referral chain — rewarding those who helped build the network.
chain.inShortStrong: Partner C keeps 100% of their earnings. No one loses anything.

outcomes.label: What Happens Next
outcomes.heading: Every Partner Wins When Revenue Is Realised
outcomes.description: The moment a client payment is confirmed, the benefit flows upward — rewarding those who built the network that made it possible.

cards.headline: Earns Full Revenue Share
cards.detail: Receives their complete earnings as per their category — International, Sales, Technology, or Service Partner. No deductions whatsoever.

cards.headline: Earns Referral Benefit
cards.detail: Receives a referral benefit for directly introducing Partner C to BNC Global and enabling the client engagement.

cards.headline: May Earn Referral Benefit
cards.detail: May also receive a referral benefit for having introduced Partner B, growing the network that ultimately generated the revenue.

flow.label: Referral Flow Diagram
flow.heading: See Who Earns What, and When
flow.description: Benefits are triggered only on realised client payments. Each position earns according to their role and proximity to the deal.

rows.label: Partner A — Network Origin
rows.sub: Introduced the platform to Partner B. May earn referral benefit when downstream revenue is realised.

rows.label: Partner B — Direct Referrer
rows.sub: Directly introduced Partner C. Earns referral benefit from BNC Global's own platform margin.

rows.label: Partner C — Deal Closer
rows.sub: Closed the client engagement. Earns their full partner revenue share — nothing deducted.

rows.label: Client — Revenue Realised
rows.sub: Project milestone payment confirmed. All referral benefits triggered upstream automatically.

compensation.label: Source of Compensation
compensation.heading: BNC Funds It. Partners Keep Everything.
compensation.description: BNC Global may allocate up to 3% from its own platform margin to compensate eligible referral partners. Your earnings are never touched.
bullets: No deduction from the partner who closes the deal
No reduction in Service or Technology delivery earnings
No impact on pre-defined partner revenue shares
Referral payout adjusted only from BNC Global's platform portion

principles.label: Core Principles of the Model
principles.heading: Built on Fairness & Transparency
principles.description: The program is designed to reward genuine network building — with clear guardrails to ensure integrity across every referral.

items.title: New Partners Only
items.desc: Applicable only for new partner onboarding. Existing partners cannot be re-entered into the referral chain.

items.title: Realised Payments Only
items.desc: Referral benefit is paid only when actual client payments are confirmed and received by BNC Global.

items.title: Active & Compliant Partner
items.desc: The referred partner must remain active and compliant on the platform for benefits to continue upstream.

items.title: No Self-Referrals
items.desc: Self-referrals and circular referral structures are strictly not permitted under any circumstance.

items.title: 3% Maximum Cap
items.desc: Total platform margin adjustment for referral compensation is strictly capped at a maximum of 3%.

items.title: BNC Determines Distribution
items.desc: The exact internal split across referral levels is determined by BNC Global based on project scope and contribution.

principles.footerText: The exact internal distribution across referral levels is determined by BNC Global at the time of structuring, based on project scope and the degree of contribution from each referral partner — ensuring fair, contextual allocation every time.

cta.label: Ready to Start?
cta.subtitle: Join BNC Global's Referral Program today. Introduce the right partners, grow your network, and watch benefits flow automatically when revenue is realised.
